profile.name: Mustafa Arastoo
profile.bio: A motivated and versatile third-year Computer Science student with a proven track record of developing innovative software solutions across AI, automation, and full-stack development. Eager to apply a strong foundation in algorithms and problem-solving to tackle complex challenges in a practical, professional environment.

projects.title: B1 English Test Preparation
projects.description: A website created to help immigrants prepare for the B1 English test, which is required to complete the British naturalisation process.

projects.title: Rhythm
projects.description: A social media platform for music reviews created as a group project at university.

projects.title: Ascend the Labyrinth
projects.description: Procedurally generated horror game created as my A-Levels project.

projects.title: Daredevil (WIP)
projects.description: VR game about defending the Earth from an invading alien army by using fruit.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern @ Metricomm
duties: Engineered an automation tool leveraging the Gemini AI API to process and summarize large Excel datasets, drastically reducing manual reporting time
Designed a robust system architecture with comprehensive error handling and fallback mechanisms to ensure high reliability and consistent performance with large-scale data processing
Solved a technical challenge with in-browser presentation generation by using a Python library with WebAssembly, overcoming a significant technical constraint and expanding application functionality
